                            <ds:OffenceTitle>Drive motor vehicle with a proportion of a specified controlled drug above the specified limit</ds:OffenceTitle>
                            <ds:ActualOffenceWording>On 19/06/2020 at Northampton in the County of Northamptonshire drove a motor vehicle, namely Skoda Octavia registration NE03DPR, on a road, namely Satterfield Harbour, Northampton, Northants, when the proportion of a controlled drug, namely cannabis, in your blood, namely 6.7ug/l, exceeded the specified limit.;Contrary to section 5A(1)(a) and (2) of the Road Traffic Act 1988 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988.</ds:ActualOffenceWording>
